value.stringValue: Load the column configuration from a custom Configuration record
Pick your table columns from a list

Flow.description: Flow designed to run inside of the datatable CPE to select and set component attributes by interacting with a sample datatable.
Flow.label: Datatable Configuration Wizard

value.stringValue: How do you want to select your columns?
Select and Order your Datatable Fields

fields.name: List_of_Field_Names
fields.fieldText: Enter a comma separated list of field API names

fields.name: FinishMessage_0
fields.fieldText: The Column Wizard requires that the selected Object ({!vSObject}) has at least one record!

fields.name: FinishMessage
fields.fieldText: Column Wizard has finished. Please close this window.

fields.name: debug
fields.fieldText:

fields.name: Configuration_Record_Name
fields.fieldText: Configuration Record Name (Enter a name here if you want to save a record of this configuration for reuse later)

fields.name: Configuration_Record_Name_Change
fields.fieldText: Configuration Record Name (Change this name if you want to Save As a new configuration)
